title: MCreator编程出现错误，mod加入游戏后游戏打不开
author: APPLE_ME
txt_content:
错误为如下。AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
:runClient FAILED
FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.
* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':runClient'.
> Process 'command 'D:\MCreator1.6.7[1.9]\jdk32\bin\java.exe'' finished with non-zero exit value -1
* Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output.
BUILD FAILED
Total time: 1 mins 39.402 secs
D:\MCreator1.6.7[1.9]\forge>
Task completed with return code 0 in 100346 milliseconds
用的是1.6.7【1.9】的，谁能告诉我怎么解决？

replies.author: 天蝎_心殇
replies.txt_content:
你好，从第一句话看得出来，你编写有问题，当然打不开，请尝试重新编写
mod制作器这玩意经常会出错
